movies.title: On the Milky Road
movies.plot: A story that stretches across war, blossoming love and living as a recluse.
movies.simplePlot: A story that stretches across war, blossoming love and living as a recluse.

biography.bio: Monica Anna Maria Bellucci was born on September 30, 1964 in the Italian village of Città di Castello, Umbria, the only child of Brunella Briganti and Pasquale Bellucci. She originally pursued a career in the legal profession. While attending the University of Perugia, she modeled on the side to earn money for school, and this led to her modeling career. In 1988, she moved to one of Europe's fashion centers, Milan, and joined Elite Model Management. Although enjoying great success as a model, she made her acting debut on television in 1990, and her American film debut in Bram Stoker's Bram Stoker's Dracula (1992). Her role in the French thriller The Apartment (1996), shot her to stardom as she won the French equivalent of an Oscar nomination. Other credits include Malena (2000), Suspicion (2000) and Brotherhood of the Wolf (2001).
biography.name: Monica Bellucci

biography.bio: A Serbian film director. Born in 1954 in Sarajevo. Graduated in film directing at the prestigious Academy of Performing Arts (FAMU) in Prague in 1978. During his studies, he was awarded several times for his short movies including Guernica (1978), which took first prize at the Student's Film Festival in Karlovy Vary. After graduation, he directed several TV movies in his hometown, Sarajevo. In collaboration with the screenwriter Abdulah Sidran in 1981, he made the successful feature debut Te souviens-tu de Dolly Bell? (1981) which won the Silver Lion for best first feature at the Venice Film Festival. Their subsequent work, human political drama Papa est en voyage d'affaires (1985) unanimously won top prize at the 1985 Cannes Film Festival as well as FIPRESCI prize and was nominated for the Best Foreign Language film Oscar. In 1989 he won the Best Director award at Cannes for Time of the Gypsies (1988), a film about the life of a gypsy family in Yugoslavia scripted by Gordan Mihic. His first English language movie, Arizona Dream (1993) starring Johnny Depp, Jerry Lewis and Faye Dunaway and scripted by his USA student, David Atkins was awarded the Silver Bear at the 1993 Berlin Film Festival. Underground (1995), a bitter surrealistic comedy about the Balkans, scripted by Dusan Kovacevic, won him a second Palme d'Or at the Cannes Film Festival in 1995.
biography.name: Emir Kusturica

biography.bio: Sloboda Micalovic was born in Leskovac. Her parents are Milica, hairdresser and Dragan Micalovic, actor. She was born as the second child (she has two sisters Mirjana and Dragana). She went to school in 1988. She loved emissions by Branko Milicevic. A family friend was working on the radio, and freedom once had the honor to interview the cubes. On her at the end said it was the perfect host. It was her first public appearance. In 1989, she enrolled in elementary music education. She was in the choir. In addition to music, she was involved in dance and sports. In 1995, Freedom is now enrolled in a music school, because she saw that he had a talent for music. Freedom decided to enroll in acting and his father moved to Belgrade in 1999. When he was in his third year of studies directed by Zdravko Sotra invited her to the casting for the film "Zona Zamfirova". Sotra gave her the role Vaske. In 2002 she won the role in "mixed marriage", and in the same year and fell in love with Vojina Cetkovica, the man he later married and with whom she had twins. The main role in the series "Wounded Eagle" is a role which made her even more famous. In 2008 and 2009 Micalovic starred in the RTS television series Ranjeni orao, which became the most-watched Serbian television series of all time. She was also considered for the role of Katarina in 2009 film Sveti Georgije ubiva azdahu, eventually given to Natasa Janjic. In 2011/2012 she starred in television series Nepobedivo srce.
biography.name: Sloboda Micalovic

biography.bio: Sergej Trifunovic was born on September 2, 1972 in Mostar, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for A Serbian Film (2010), Next (2007) and When I Grow Up, I'll Be a Kangaroo (2004).
biography.name: Sergej Trifunovic

biography.bio: Predrag 'Miki' Manojlovic was born on April 5, 1950 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia as Predrag Manojlovic. He is an actor and director, known for Underground (1995), Na terapiji (2009) and The World Is Big (2008).
biography.name: Predrag 'Miki' Manojlovic

biography.bio: Zoran Cvijanovic was born on January 25, 1958 in Belgrade, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and producer, known for Joli village, jolie flamme (1996), Ivko's Feast (2005) and Mile vs. tranzicija (2003).
biography.name: Zoran Cvijanovic

biography.bio: Maria Darkina was born in Russia and was raised in Prague, Czech Republic. She started acting at an early age, continuing studying Theatre, Drama and Music in High School in Czech Republic. She also took an Acting course at Royal Academy of Dramatic Arts (RADA) in London. She later came to Los Angeles, California, where she got her degree from Acting at a renowned Film school.
biography.name: Maria Darkina

biography.bio: Davor Janjic was born on November 18, 1969 in Tuzla, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for (A)Torzija (2003), Life is a Miracle (2004) and Zivot sa stricem (1988).
biography.name: Davor Janjic

biography.bio: Bajram Severdzan is an actor, known for Black Cat, White Cat (1998), On the Milky Road (2016) and The Third Half (2012).
biography.name: Bajram Severdzan

biography.placeOfBirth: Rusko Selo near Kikinda, Serbia, Yugoslavia
biography.bio: Novak Bilbija was born on January 1, 1950 in Rusko Selo near Kikinda, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for On the Milky Road (2016), The Tour (2008) and Vukovar Poste Restante (1994).
biography.name: Novak Bilbija

biography.bio: Branislav Fistric is known for his work on District 13: Ultimatum (2009), The Brothers Bloom (2008) and Coriolanus (2011).
biography.name: Branislav Fistric

biography.bio: Darko Kurtovic is an actor, known for On the Milky Road (2016) and Lud, zbunjen, normalan (2007).
biography.name: Darko Kurtovic

biography.bio: Petar Mircevski was born on November 11, 1956 in Krusevo, Macedonia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Before the Rain (1994), Kontakt (2005) and The Border Post (2006).
biography.name: Petar Mircevski

biography.bio: Ratka Radmanovic is an actress, known for Shadows (2007), Punk's Not Dead (2011) and The Third Half (2012).
biography.name: Ratka Radmanovic
